duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with clients, project stakeholders to advance goals and objectives
Partner with company leadership to formulate and implement the firm’s strategic goals and vision
Provide guidance, mentoring, and instruction to staff
Monitor and review the work of staff; make recommendations and provide clear and concise feedback
Oversee project adherence to local, state, and federal building codes/regulations
Manage and track change orders and other contractual modifications
Determine project staffing needs and recommend personnel
Participate in the development of proposals and interviews for potential projects

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited college or university or equivalent training and experience in project management
Licensed Engineer with 5+ years of experience preferred; related degrees, industries, disciplines, experiences may be substituted
Program/project controls, engineering design, and/or construction management experience desired
